A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Good: 
-Cinematography 
-Adam Driver's performance

The Bad:
-Film is full of Slapstick humor & Comic Relief. Imagine if Luke's training on Dagobah had been interrupted by Gungans farting and talking about bantha poodoo. This movie does that.  
-Terrible CG...like prequel-era bad.
-Pointless subplots with poorly written characters that contribute nothing to the overall story
-The Casino: what were they thinking? Completely pulled us out of the star wars universe.
-CG nipples\, CG multi-breasted casino goes. Seriously what were they thinking? 
-Cute CG animals intended purely to sell merchandise. Overused\, and so painfully obvious. Zero subtlety at any point. 
-Added very little to the story or the character development
